EmailTemplate.name: Follow-up Defect Notice EWP
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-Up Defect Notice: {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!License_Registration__c.Applicant__c}:
Your {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} application for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been reviewed and defected again for not meeting all of the application requirements. Please review the attached Follow-up Defect Notice included in this email, which lists each specific defect in your application. You are required to complete the requested adjustments to your application and re-submit it within {!License_Registration__c.Defect_Response_Time__c} days from the date of the First Defect Notice email, but this Follow-Up Defect Notice serves as a courtesy to inform you that there are still pending requirements.To resubmit your application once defect items are complete and saved, on the left-hand screen list, scroll down and click on "Completion Review", select "Yes" and <Next>, then click <Submit> on the "Submit" screen. Note, if you do not resubmit the application within {!License_Registration__c.Defect_Response_Time__c} days from the date of the First Defect Notice, your application may be eligible for closure.
To log in and make changes, please visit{!Rejection__c.Registration_Community_URL__c} and select {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} number {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}. {!License_Registration__c.Registration_Site__c}
Sincerely, Entertainment Work Permit Unit Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California Phone: (818)901-5484
